|brand = AOpen |model = ME4100 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = media player |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = YEW-ME4100CM389, TLZ-CM389NF |icid = 20532-ME4100CM389 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Rockchip;RK3288; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A17 |cpu1spd = 1.8 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC 5.1 |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SanDisk;SDINADF4-16G; |flash1size = 16 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = NOR |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = GigaDevice;GD25Q32CSIG; |flash2size = 4 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 4 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4E6E304EB-EGCF; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211E; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:01:80 |oui = 00:01:80
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 19 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI 2.0, Bluetooth 4.2 (BLE), Audio in/out (3.5 mm), power switch, heatsink, metal case |addchip = 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL852G;;1;,,, Power Management IC w/RTC;Rockchip;RK808-C;;1;,,, Low Power Stereo Audio Codec;Maxim Integrated;MAX98090;;1;,,, Autonomous Audio Accessory Detection and Configuration Switch;TI;TS3A227E;;1;,,, USB Charging Port Controller;TI;TPS2546;;3;,,, Trusted Platform Module I2C Interface;Infineon;SLB9645TT;;1;,,, 75V 3A Step-Down Switching Regulator;National Semiconductor;LM5576;;1;,,, P-Channel MOSFET;Toshiba;TCPA8123;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Alpine Linux
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 03/16/2017 |estreldate = 01/2017 |estprice = 231.99 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = 4712947234474 |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIAFJ8A0U5313 |asin = B01MSCUMDE |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AzureWave AW-CM389NF |rad1modif = LGA SD |rad1chip1 = Marvell;88W8897; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = MHF4, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 867 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300/300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "DA00H5MB6C0" and "REV:C" are silkscreened on both sides of board.
===Specifications=== *CPU: ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3228 @1.8GHz :Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A17) *GPU: Mali-400 MP2 (OpenGL ES1.1/2.0) *Memory: 4GB (SDRAM) LPDDR3 *Storage: 16GB eMMC 5.1 Flash, :4MB SPI NOR Flash *WiFi: [[Marvell]] 88W8897 :802.11abgn/ac (2T2R), BT 4.2 BLE *USB: 3x USB 2.0 ports *Network: 1x 1GbE ports *Power Source: 19V 2.1A via barrel
==Links of Interest== *[https://chromebook.wiki/chromeosdevices/aopenfievel ''AOpen Chromebox Mini'' on '''Chromebook Wiki'''] *[https://www.geeky-gadgets.com/apon-chromebox-mini-unveiled-18-01-2017/ ''AOPEN Chromebox Mini Unveiled'' on '''Geeky Gadgets'''] *[https://wiki.alpinelinux.org/wiki/Alpine_on_the_Aopen_Chromebase_or_Chromebox_Mini_with_Mainline_Kernel ''Alpine on the Aopen Chromebase or Chromebox Mini'' on '''Alpine Linux Wiki''']
